## Homework 03 - due 10/04/2017

Using the HELP dataset:

* create a first draft of "Table 1" (see example below)
* provide the summary stats for the baseline data - overall and by gender
* determine whether you want to provide parametric or non-parametric stats
* include the appropriate statistical test comparing the baseline measurements and variables by gender
* write a statistical methods section on the methods you used to create Table 1 and make the comparisons by gender
* write 1-2 paragraphs describing the sample overall at baseline and by group (use the data in table 1 to help you)
